text: Atrivim Amasia, Judaba ko Benjaminɨn adarazi bar men diazɨ, me iza uari akufa. Me iza uari akuvazɨ, a 20plan azeniba itir gumazir igiaba ko 20plan azenibagh afiraziba amɨsevegha, me isa uan mɨdorozir gumazibar me arɨki. Egha a 1,000plan mɨdorozir gumazibar garir gumazir dapaniba, ko 100plan mɨdorozir gumazibar garir gumazir dapaniba amɨsefe. Egha a ikɨziba vaghvagha, men ganasa gumazir dapanir maba arɨki. Ezɨ mɨdorozir gumazibar dɨbobonim 300,000ɨn tu. Me bar moghɨra afuziba ko orabar suigha mɨsoghan bar fo.
